select la.user_account, la.user_real_name, la.log, la.create_time, ct.crontab_task_name from log_action la,crontab_task ct
AND la.bill_id LIKE concat('%',#{query.billId},'%')
AND la.user_account LIKE concat('%',#{query.userAccount},'%')
AND la.create_time >= #{query.createTimeBegin}
AND la.create_time <= #{query.createTimeEnd}
AND ct.crontab_task_name LIKE concat('%',#{query.crontabTaskName},'%')
And la.bill_id = ct.id AND type = 106
order by la.create_time desc
